title: Bug In The Boards
body:
Hi, 

I just wanted to let the people who maintain these boards know that there is a bug in the system. For the second time after trying to create a poll I have received an error and lost the information written. 

Hope this is fixed soon.

Cheers.

replies.body: We don't maintain the forums in the technical sense, but I'll notify the Rioters who do right now. That's for letting us know :D
